A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely terrible\, I'd love for any serious critic to explain how this movie is certified fresh. Without delving into any Star Wars lore or giving anything away\, there is NO character development\, the plot is very weak\, numerous plot holes and none of the twists or plot surprises we were promised. I have read critic reviews talking about plot twists\, someone please point out any plot twist from the movie.\n\nA case of the \"Emperors New Clothes\"\, Disney would have you believe the low audience score is a result of a small number of disgruntled hardcore fans\, however this is truly a bad movie in every sense of the word.
